name: A Fairy Tale Adventure
overview: This is a traditional text adventure with 78 locations to visit and over 23 different objects to find. It is vert loosely based around several traditional tales. Once upon a time, in a land far away, there lived an evil Ogre who delighted in terrorising the villagers. He would steal their sheep, rob their treasures and burn their houses to the ground. Your task is to visit the ogre's cottage when the ogre is away and recover the three items of treasure hidden there. Your task will not be easy, and you will need to kill the ogre when you have accomplished your task. Published in Computer Gamer 1986/01 (Issue #10) as a type-in game.
